title: Feature Request: Allow extending Estimator
body_html:
Our model is time based and we are doing continuous training and eval on the same machine. The model is very large and takes 1+ minutes to load, so we don't want the overhead of reloading the graph and weights every time we switch from training to eval #13895 (comment).

I tried to subclass Estimator to override the _train_model fn but it is not allowed due to this white-list. Can you remove this restriction and let people override methods at their own peril?

Subclasses of Estimator cannot override members of Estimator. <class ... does override ['_train_model'] (relates to #12908).
body_text:
Our model is time based and we are doing continuous training and eval on the same machine. The model is very large and takes 1+ minutes to load, so we don't want the overhead of reloading the graph and weights every time we switch from training to eval #13895 (comment).
I tried to subclass Estimator to override the _train_model fn but it is not allowed due to this white-list. Can you remove this restriction and let people override methods at their own peril?
Subclasses of Estimator cannot override members of Estimator. <class ... does override ['_train_model'] (relates to #12908).
body:
Our model is time based and we are doing continuous training and eval on the same machine. The model is very large and takes 1+ minutes to load, so we don't want the overhead of reloading the graph and weights every time we switch from training to eval https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/13895#issuecomment-375990484.

I tried to subclass Estimator to override the `_train_model fn` but it is not allowed due to this [white-list](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/e7f158858479400f17a1b6351e9827e3aa83e7ff/tensorflow/python/estimator/estimator.py#L524-L528). Can you remove this restriction and let people override methods at their own peril?

`Subclasses of Estimator cannot override members of Estimator. <class ... does override ['_train_model']` (relates to https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/12908).
